original_text: Jesus replied, ‘You people today still do not believe in God. You have turned away from him. I have been with you for a long time and still you do not believe. It is difficult for me to be patient with you.’ Then Jesus said to the man, ‘Bring the boy here to me.’
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 믿음이 없고 패역한 세대여 내가 얼마나 너희와 함께 있으며 얼마나 너희에게 참으리요 그를 이리로 데려오라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: You people today still do not believe in God
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘날 너희는 여전히 하나님을 믿지 않는다

sentences.original_text: You have turned away from him
I have been with you for a long time
and still you do not believe
It is difficult for me to be patient with you
Then Jesus said to the man
Bring the boy here to me
